title: Chocolate cream pie
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) digestive biscuits', '140g (5 oz) melted butter', '300ml (1/2 pint) semi-skimmed milk', '2 eggs', '30g (1 oz) plain flour', '1 1/2 level teaspoons cornflour', '30g (1 oz) caster sugar', '30g (1 oz) unsalted butter', '45g (3 1/2 oz) grated dark chocolate', '2 teaspoons brandy, rum, whisky, coffee liqueur or CointreauÂ®', 'Icing sugar, for dusting']
